Posts.Content: MadhuriUpadhyay wrote: Hello All, I hope everyone is having a nice weekend. I just had 4 rounds of chemo with carbo-taxol with no shrinkage of my tumors to my lungs & bones (metastatic breast cancer). Since i am 90% ER+, my doctor has put me on Arimidex (1mg daily & zometa once in 4 weeks) & will take my blood test every 2 weeks for tumor marker results. I am curious if anyone has a good story to share on Ariimidex, basically, anyone out there living with metastatic breast cancer taking Arimidex with good results & for how long. Chemotherapy 6/28/2012 Carboplatin (Paraplatin), Taxol (paclitaxel) Dx ER+/PR+, HER2- Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Arimidex success rate MadhuriUpadhyay SyrMom
